Title: iOS Developer
Proficient: Python, Swift, iOS App Dev, Testing, wire framing, project brainstorming and User centered design
Description: He/Him - I am an iOS developer. I previously worked at JPMorgan Chase and Lululemon as a Mobile Software Engineer. I enjoy learning new things, building apps, working out, and hanging out with friends. The main reason I want to be a mentor is to help others succeed in any way I can. My mentors have been a big help during my journey in software, so I want to be able to do that for someone else.

Title: Junior Mentor
Proficient: Project brainstorming, User-testing, design feedback, java, C
Description: She/Her - Hi everyone! My name is Bhavya. I moved to San Antonio five years ago and love it here. During my free time I either play tennis with my sister or just paint.

Title: Industry Mentor
Description: Hello! I am the former Executive Director of RowdyHacks for 2021, and I am excited to return and mentor! I really love helping hackers brainstorm and optimize their projects with the goal of completing them. Outside of the hacking space, I like to play D&D, play video games, go on hikes, and hang out with friends.

Title: Software Engineer
Description: I'm a Software Engineer at Twitter and a UTSA Alumna based in Austin, TX. I work on building and improving the media experience on the Twitter Android App. I led RowdyHacks in 2020 and I am happy to be back as a mentor!

Title: Industry Mentor
Description: Hi I'm Jada! I went to UTSA 2016-2020 and was on the 2019-2020 RowdyHacks and ACM exec teams. I am currently working as a SEP at JPMC. Prior to RH22, I've hacked at 11 hackathons, judged for 3, was a company sponsor, and have been to Hackcon twice but this will be the first time I've mentored! Fun facts are: lived in SA from K-16th grade (aka college); I love Rottweilers; I own every PlayStation; & I don't typically use cases for my phones

Title: Software Engineer
Description: Hi I'm Retro! I work for Scratch, an online programming website. I like to read and watch YouTube videos in my free time!

Title: Front-End Developer
Description: Java, some python, user-testing, design feedback, project brainstorming

Title: Software Engineer
Description: Java, Testing, Design Feedback, Project Brainstorming

Title: Cybersecurity Specialist
Description: I am a gamer, I am a adrenaline junkie (skydive, cliff dive, BMX, MX, etc.) Robotics engineer, Cyber Security Engineer, Lab Tech, Lab Lead, AI architect, Drone Engineer, Clothing Tailor, I love to cook, AR/XR Researcher, SatCom Engineer, SDR Engineer, Biomechanical enthusiast and researcher focusing on HMI for Robotics

Title: Software Engineer
Description: I am a Full-Stack Software Engineer at Valero Energy Corp. assigned to new project development in Valero's Information Services department. I am also part of Valero's Volunteer Council, the Valero I/S Recruiting Program, and I serve as a mentor to Valero I/S interns and entry-level developers. Looking to mentor and help out however I can! In my spare time I play golf, do programming side projects, play video games, volunteer, and travel.
